summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Driver Management System. Backend APIs mostly functional (75% success rate), frontend UI working well with minor modal overlay issue. All core features tested including authentication, CRUD operations, navigation, and role-based access.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Health check endpoint not responding correctly
flaky_endpoints.impact: Monitoring and health checks may not work

flaky_endpoints.issue: Get driver endpoint failing for some IDs
flaky_endpoints.impact: Edit functionality may be affected for certain drivers

flaky_endpoints.issue: Status update endpoint failing in API tests
flaky_endpoints.impact: Status changes may not work via direct API calls

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks navigation when sticker modal is open

design_issues.issue: Using CDN Tailwind CSS in production (console warning)
design_issues.recommendation: Install Tailwind CSS as PostCSS plugin for production

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with accurate stats (Total: 6, Aktiv: 3, Inaktiv: 1, Neu: 2)
Driver table displays all drivers with proper data
Add driver modal opens and form submission works
Edit driver modal loads existing data correctly
Status dropdown changes work in UI
Delete buttons are present and functional
Sticker page loads with add functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix backend API endpoints: /api/health, /drivers/get/{id}, and /drivers/status/{id}. Consider implementing proper Tailwind CSS build process for production. Modal overlay issue is minor but could be improved for better UX.
